divs: sighting detailsi just want to know if mufon has ever heard of anything simular to this. please respond!!!! on i believe it was april 2nd, 8:30ish pm, me, and a bunch of friends(4 if memory serves.) were playing spot-light tag in a lightly wooded\prarie grass type area behind my neighborhood that we called "the weeds". we spotted a lumunous globe approx. 5ft. in diameter stream from out of the western sky until it was above a tree line the bordered a corn field ajacent to our position. we were in a very gentle rolling valley. "the weeds" making up the southern slope, & the cornfield making up the northern one. we were about 3\4 the way down our side of this valley playing when we all just kinda became aware of this thing kinda all at once. i don't remember like anybody yelling, "hey!!! look at that!!!" i just remember we all seemed to look and see this thing all together. anyhow. it flew from the west until it was directly accross from us at the top of the cornfield above this tree line. it's speed of movement can only be disribed as, "as fast as you could zip the beam of a flashlight across a wall." very fast!!! it was, as i said, approx. 5ft in diameter. it glowed a soft turquoise blue. and it made zero noise. this part i'm kinda fuzzy on. it either turn orange, & then desended directly into the tree line! or it desended directly into the tree line & then turned orange. i can't remember which. either way, the only thing we've got that could desend like that? are helicopters. which the rotors would have been torn to pieces in the trees. or a harrier jump jet. which makes all kinds of noise. this object\craft was entirely silent! while on the ground it was orange. it stayed there for what seemed like maybe a minute, or two. while there it pulsed in a slowed ebbing constant rythmn. it then change colors back to the blue. i believe before returning back to the sky to it's old altitude.(no more than 150ft. it seemed like) & zipped directly back the way it came, every bit as fast as it had appeared. i don't believe any of us experienced "lost time". none of us were afraid either during, or directly following the event. a very interesting sidebar! it left an indentation where it landed approx. 5ft. in diameter, & 3ft. or so deep. stupidly, we played in this indentation! made it our fort! it was not a "crater". no burn\scorch marks. more like the dirt had just been removed. sidebar #2: seperate from this event, my best friend told me years(3 or 4) after this that he'd seen a saucer above his house(across and a door down from my house.) when we were like 7, or 8. the above event happened when we were approx. 10\11. he said he'd seen these lights through the curtains in their living roomwhen he gotten up to go to the bathroom, he looked out, and saw this craft floating above the street light at the end of his driveway. he ran to the front door to get a better look, only to not see it. he went outside to fine that it had moved above his house! he said he paniced, & run back in to his bed. he also said he'd had "nightmares" about them coming back to get him for year afterwards. it should also be noted that there was a strange blacken circle on the street directly in front of the very light he'd stated the craft was hovering over for years while we were growing up. now the part that makes my skin go creepy. as a teen years after friend #1 had told me of his experience?(now age 15\16) my other friend and i were talking late one night. out of the blue, with no prompting,or mention from me, he brings up that he too had seen the craft that friend #1 had seen! apparently at the same time, on the same night! friend #2 stated he too had gotten up to go to the bathroom, and saw lights coming through his bathroom window. which faces friend #1's house. he then run to his kitchen, where he said he looked through these luever\shutter things they had on the inside of the kitchen windows. he told me he saw basically the same craft that friend #1 had described. a saucer with multi-colored strobing\flashing lights. friend #2 said he too paniced, & run back his bed. so i had two seperate people, that i trust, tell me the same story from each of their own pov's, but they tell me this years apart! independent of each other. with the second not knowing what the first had told me until after he'd told his side of the story! i still know both these gentlemen. but they have families, and i seriously doubt that they'd be willing to step forward. however, i am 100% willing to take as many poly-graph tests as you want me to, to prove to you that everything that i've just re-counted to you did indeed happen to the best of my knowledge just as i described. please e-mail me a response as to if mufon has ever heard of an encounter like the one i described having in "the weeds" on april 2nd, around 8:30 pm. i really want to know if anybody else has seen what we all saw that night. thank you for your time & consideration. sincerely, [cms\tg\pid]
